content: If you enable this guest, they will be able to log in to {{productName}} again.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe a guest's ability to log into {{productName}} after enabling their guest status. It appears in a change user status dialog and provides context for users enabling guest access. Translators should replace "ProductName" with the actual product name.

usage.context:
? t("EnableGuests")
 : t("EnableUsers");
 
 bodyText = onlyOneUser
 ? isGuests
 ? t("EnableGuestDescription", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })
 : t("EnableUserDescription", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })
 : isGuests
 ? t("EnableGuestsDescription", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })
 : t("EnableUsersDescription", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") });

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'este podrá' is a slightly awkward construction. A more natural phrasing in Spanish would be 'podrá'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Si activa este invitado, podrá volver a iniciar sesión en {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'guest' is translated as 'ຜູ້ລ້ຽງແຂກ' which literally means 'guest caretaker'. A more appropriate translation for 'guest' in this context would be 'ຜູ້ໃຊ້ແຂກ' (guest user) or simply 'ແຂກ' (guest).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຖ້າທ່ານເປີດໃຊ້ແຂກນີ້, ພວກເຂົາຈະສາມາດເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບ {{productName}} ໄດ້ອີກຄັ້ງ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation uses "viņš (-a)" which is a clunky way to refer to a guest of unknown gender.  It's better to avoid specifying gender unless it's essential.  While grammatically correct, it reads awkwardly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ja iespējosiet šo viesi, viņš varēs pieteikties {{productName}} vēlreiz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'gościa' (guest) sounds awkward and informal in this context. It implies a casual or even slightly disrespectful tone. It's better to use a more neutral term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jeśli włączysz tego użytkownika, będzie mógł/mogła ponownie zalogować się na {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit clunky. While technically correct, it's not the most natural way to phrase it in Polish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Po włączeniu tego użytkownika będzie mógł/mogła ponownie zalogować się na {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "log in" is inaccurate. "Conecta" implies a connection, not the action of logging in. The correct term would be "să se autentifice".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dacă activați un invitat, acesta va putea să se autentifice din nou la {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'acesta va putea' is a little clunky. A more natural flow would be 'va putea'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dacă activați un invitat, acesta va putea să se autentifice din nou la {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb "подключите" (podklyuchite) implies connecting or linking, which doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'enable' in this context. 'Enable' means to allow or make possible. A better translation would be something along the lines of 'разрешите' (razreshite) which means 'allow'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Если вы разрешите этого гостя, он снова сможет войти в {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ඔබ' (oba) meaning 'you' is unnecessary and grammatically awkward in this context. It's better to omit it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම ආගන්තුකයා සක්‍රීය කළහොත්, ඔවුන්ට නැවත {{productName}} වෙත පිවිසිය හැකි වනු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'will be able to log in' is too literal. A more natural Turkish phrasing would be 'yine giriş yapabilecekler'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu konuğu etkinleştirirseniz, {{productName}} üzerinden yeniden giriş yapabilecekler.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'đăng nhập lại' can be ambiguous. While it can mean 'log in again', it might be better to clarify that they can log in *to* the product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu bạn kích hoạt khách này, họ sẽ có thể đăng nhập lại vào {{productName}}.
